text: Donald John Bacon (born August 16, 1963) is an American politician and former military officer. He is the U.S. Representative for Nebraska's 2nd congressional district since 2017. He was a United States Air Force officer, before his retirement in 2014. Bacon is a member of the Republican Party. In a December 2020 Washington Post found that Bacon was one of 37 who said Joe Biden won the 2020 election and did not support President Donald Trump's voter fraud claims. In May 2021, Bacon was one of 35 Republicans who joined all Democrats in voting to approve legislation to create the January 6 commission meant to investigate the storming of the U.S. Capitol. He was one of only a few Republican lawmakers who openly supported the commission. ==References== ==Other websites== *Congressman Don Bacon official U.S. House website *Don Bacon for Congress * * * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Nebraska Category:Politicians from Omaha, Nebraska Category:Politicians from Illinois Category:Military people from Illinois Category:American generals Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Don Bacon
